name: News Summarizer
title: News Summarizer
description: Extract quick highlights from news articles using state of the art text summarizer.

endpoints.name: News Summarizer
endpoints.description:
Get abstractive and extractive summaries of news articles by providing the raw text of the article or a web URL of the article.

Parameters:
`input_link`: URL of the article.
`input_text`: Raw text of the article.

Use one of the above two parameters. If both are provided, only `input_text` will be picked.

Guidance:
It is advised to use `input_text` parameter as opposed to `input_link` if all your articles come from a small set of source websites. In such a case, you can write a parser for your articles which is custom-tailored to the structure of your articles and hence no extra phrases are captured during the parsing of the text.
